__e: I'm sorry about this, but... why not take the golden parachute?
Yeah, well, just get your board seat back so I can pull the rip cord on my golden parachute.
Her chute didn't open, neither did the backup.
But the weird thing is, when you're in a situation like that, you're flying down at 120 miles per hour, and when your chute doesn't open, you seriously have to think about pulling the other one.
